\n\tLog in to your Grist account. Naviga:
Log in to your Grist account. Navigate to the account menu at the top right, and select **Profile Settings** to manage or create your API Key.
	In the **Domain URL** field, enter the domain URL of your Grist instance.For example,if you have team site it will be "https://team.getgist.com".
在特定表中创建新记录。
通过匹配的条件搜索记录。
Updates an existing record in specific t: 更新特定表格中的现有记录。
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Enter the search text. The search operat: 输入搜索文本。搜索操作是区分大小写的，准确的文本匹配，只支持列类型文本。
In case you want to change the name of t: 如果您想要更改附件的名称.
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
Triggers when a new record is added to t: 当新记录添加到表格时触发事件。
Triggers when a record is updated in the: 在表中更新记录时触发事件。
A toggle (boolean) column which is True: 当记录准备就绪时，开关(布尔)列为 True。触发器只有在记录准备就绪时才会被激活。 按照 [guideline](https://support.getgrist.com/integrators/#readiness-column)租用以在表格中创建准备状态栏。
